post:
TinyVZ, a division of RAM Host, for nearly 4 years has been providing quality budget web hosting services.

We are pleased to announce that we have fully re-stocked our popular TinyVZ offer.

For only $15 per year, you get all this:

128 MB Dedicated RAM
256 MB Burstable RAM
10 GB Disk Space
500 GB Transfer
Gigabit (1000mbps) Network Port
Out of band console access
VPS management control panel
Native IPv6
RAID10 protected storage
Multi-homed HE+Cogent bandwidth.
Kansas City location in the midwest USA.

Visit http://tinyvz.com/ to place your order.
